events.comment:
gameState keeps track at what state the game is currently in.
-1: Loading, game hasn't started 0: Game is running 1: Game is finished

variable.comment: keeps track at what state the game is in
variable.name: gameState

variable.comment: Used to keep track of how long the player has been playing on the map
variable.name: timer

variable.comment: Indicator if a random event is already in progress
variable.name: randomEventRunning

variable.comment: variable to identify that the flood should go down
variable.name: floodReverse

variable.comment: how much does the terrain reduces the force generated by the Player
variable.name: terrain_force_reduction

variable.comment: how much does the hand of god random event boosts the player
variable.name: hand_of_god_force_boost

variable.comment: Indicator if a beggar has been spawned
variable.name: beggar_spawned

variable.comment: Amount of force applied to the Player object
variable.name: VEHICLE_FORCE

variable.comment: How much force is applied to the Player object upwards
variable.name: VEHICLE_FORCE_UPWARDS

variable.comment: the default text of the GameStatus object
variable.name: GAME_STATUS_DEFAULT_TEXT

sub-events.comment: At the start of layout, reset the global variables to default value

Check which map to use.
1. City 2. Rural
Because the delman has more area, using the standard force value makes it very slow moving, so it needs its own force value

variable.comment: variable to set which random event to fire
variable.name: randomEventType

variable.comment: variable to identify if a random event should be fired
variable.name: randomEvent

sub-events.comment: Every x seconds, randomize if a random event will trigger
If randomEvent is 1, select from the available random event to trigger

Check for what kind of random event to fire.
0 = Smog 1 = Flood 2 = Earthquake 3 = Hand of God

event-group.description: Controls the flood random event logic
event-group.title: Flood

sub-events.comment: When the Player's vehicle is underwater
Make water go up
Make water go down

event-group.description: Handles the Hand of God (Beggar) random event logic
event-group.title: Hand of God (Beggar)

variable.comment: indicate if a beggar should spawn
variable.name: spawnBeggar

event-group.description: Manages the logic for the player's movement
event-group.title: Movement

variable.comment: how much offset from the ground for the vehicle to be considered "touching"
variable.name: overlapping_offset

sub-events.comment: W or Up arrow key is used to accelerate the Player object by applying force to the right
S or Down arrow key is used to deaccelerate the Player object by applying force to the left
D or Right arrow key is used to allow the player to rotate their vehicle clockwise
A or Left arrow key is used to allow the player to rotate their vehicle counter-clockwise
Space bar will reset the car to the starting position

event-group.description: Manages timer (elapsed time the player has played in the map)
event-group.title: Timer Group

event-group.description: Manages the logic for power ups
event-group.title: Power Ups

variable.comment: variable to set which power up to display
variable.name: powerUpType

variable.comment: variable to identify if a power up should be spawned
variable.name: powerUp

sub-events.comment: If powerUp is 8, spawn a lucky box
When the player hits a lucky block and hits the space bar, destroy the lucky block

Check for what kind of power up the player is given.
0 = Indomie
If the player holds a power up, pressing the "Use Power Up" key will consume the power up.
If a lucky box is not activated after going off map to the left, destroy it

variable.comment: identifies if a coin should spawn
variable.name: spawnCoin

sub-events.comment: When the player hits the finish flag, the game ends
